data_table.description: Family ID, subject ID, father ID, mother ID, twin ID for monozygotic twins, and sex of participants with or without cardiovascular disease and involved in the "NHLBI TOPMed: The Jackson Heart Study" project.

variable.name: MZ_TWIN_ID
variable.description: Twin ID for monozygotic twins and multiples. An MZ_TWIN_ID is not provided for dizygotic twins or multiples.

variable.name: unannotated_Deg2
variable.value: if individual has kinship coefficient between 0.088 and 0.177 (i.e. likely second degree relative) with one or more individuals outside his/her family indicating relatedness not accounted for by the pedigree;
